Package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping

Class RectangleRoomFinder

java.lang.Object
squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.RectangleRoomFinder
public class RectangleRoomFinder
extends java.lang.Object
An algorithm to find rectangle areas in dungeons. It is a simpler and faster alternative to RoomFinder. You can execute RectangleRoomsFinderTest to see how it performs.
Author:
smelC
See Also:
A fancier room finder

    • floors

      protected final java.util.Set<java.lang.Character> floors

    • minimumDiagonal

      public int minimumDiagonal
      The minimum number of cells that the diagonal of a room must have. Having 3 here means that, by default, only rooms at most 3x3 are considered.

    • onlySquareRooms

      public boolean onlySquareRooms
      true to restrict this to find square rooms

    • addFloorCharacter

      public boolean addFloorCharacter​(char c)
      Adds a character considered as a floor.
      Parameters:
      c -
      Returns:
      true if c wasn't a floor character.

    • removeFloorCharacter

      public boolean removeFloorCharacter​(char c)
      Removes a character from being considered as a floor.
      Parameters:
      c -
      Returns:
      true if c was a floor character.

    • findRectangles

      public java.util.List<Rectangle> findRectangles()
      Returns:
      The rectangles of the dungeon given at creation time.

    • extendRoom

      protected Rectangle extendRoom​(boolean[][] assigneds, Rectangle r, Direction d)
      Parameters:
      assigneds - Cells already in a room.
      d - A cardinal direction.
      Returns:
      A variant of r extended to the direction d, if possible. r itself if unaffected.

    • extendRoomOnce

      protected Rectangle extendRoomOnce​(boolean[][] assigneds, Rectangle r, Direction d)
      Parameters:
      assigneds - Cells already in a room. This array is muted by this call.
